column4: Anyways,enough of my stories,now to the real thing.His smile surely sends positive messages and his hair is surely detailed,like a wave of brown curled onto a head.In his hand is a 1x1 blue brick(his female counterpart has a 1x1 red brick) which I suspect he is giving as a gift to his female identity.Nothing new with the red legs,which seems obvious not to print anything on them.

column3: The torso was suprising,it works exactly like a normal brick.The arms come out of circled rings of the torso,which is a small detail not important or even that much of noticeable at all.And he has some nice red gloves on his supposedly yellow hands.

OK,this guy is easy.1.You have a better chance to get him from any old pack for he is really common.2.Feel for the studs and make sure they are on a thick object,very easy step.3.To distinguish male and female is a bit hard.To find out,feel for the hair.If it has a small thing sticking out,it is a ponytail belonging to Mrs.Bricksuit.If it does not have that and has small wrinkles,you got Mr.Bricksuit!
